column5: I was browsing lokal newspaper, and I've found this "jewel"  GET PAID TO ENJOY the outdoors Staff required for CT hot dog carts Year around employment Flexible days E-mail resume to.....

I just had an idea.  Put a hot dog cart on my boat and sell them to boaters/anglers out on the Kawarthas....  How much would you pay for a nice fresh hot dog out on the water?  I'd probably part with $5....LOL.
Methinks you would have to get a pontoon boat Cliff...or a hibatchi on the middle seat of yours...
Hey Cliff it would work.......  this past sunday i was on Sparrow and there was a pontoon ice cream boat out there and it seemed to be pretty busy.   peps
Which reminds me... I need to update my Hot Dog Cart resume!!!
